summer plan #2 Cesar Frank - violin sonata

Benjamin Britten - War Requiem, Des Irae
no complete recording : |

Debussy - Trois Norcturnes, Fetes

on a classical music rampage after finding so much good stuff from studying.

learning about the amazing Mendelssohn's violin concerto from the legend herself: Anne-Sophie Mutter. interesting stuff about the origins of the music. proves once again that music is created not only by the score but by the performer's emotional connection with it.
